sections.heading: Core Functions
sections.content:
から has 3 main uses:

Starting point (from - place) Time since (from/since - time) Reason (because)

sections.heading: 1. Starting Point (Place)
sections.content:
Where something starts from:

東京から来ました - "came from Tokyo" 家から駅まで - "from home to station" ここから - "from here"

sections.heading: 2. Time Since
sections.content:
When something starts:

9時から - "from 9 o'clock" 今日から - "from today" 昨日から - "since yesterday"

Often paired with まで (until):

9時から5時まで - "from 9 to 5" 月曜から金曜まで - "from Monday to Friday"

sections.heading: 3. Reason (Because)
sections.content:
Giving a reason:

雨が降ったから、家にいた "Because it rained, I stayed home" 忙しいから、行けません "Because I'm busy, I can't go"

Pattern: [Reason]から、[Result]

sections.heading: から vs まで
sections.content: から = starting point (from) まで = ending point (to/until) 東京から京都まで "from Tokyo to Kyoto"

sections.heading: から vs ので (Reason)
sections.content:
Both mean "because":

から = subjective, personal reason ので = objective, factual reason 忙しいから行けない "Can't go because I'm busy" (personal) 雨が降ったので中止 "Canceled because it rained" (objective)

See: から vs ので

children.heading: Place
children.content: [Place]から [Verb] 日本から来ました - "came from Japan"

children.heading: Time
children.content: [Time]から[Time]まで 9時から5時まで - "9 to 5"

children.heading: Reason
children.content: [Reason]から、[Result] 疲れたから休む - "rest because tired"

sections.heading: Key Takeaways
sections.content:
✓ Starting point (place/time) ✓ "Because" (reason) ✓ Often with まで (from... to...) ✓ More subjective than ので

Related:

まで (made) - Until ので (node) - Because から vs ので
